opis: KUĆA, PRODAJA, ZAGREB, BUKOVAC, 224 m2, 4-sobna Prodaje se prekrasna četverosobna kuća s prostranim dvorištem. Kuća se nalazi na Gornjem Bukovcu. Površina kuće iznosi 224 m2 s obračunatim koeficijentima dok stambena površina kuće iznosi 170 m2. Kuća se sastoji od 2 etaže: - PRIZEMLJA  - dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom, predprostor, garaža, wc, gospodarstvo te terasa s vrtom, - 1. KATA - tri spavaće sobe, garderoba, kupaonica te hodnik. Kuća je napravljena 2004. godine a kompletno je renovirana 2011. godine dok je fasada obnovljena 2021. godine. Sustav grijanja : etažno plinsko centralno. Podno grijanje je provedeno svugdje gdje je postavljena keramika. Svaka soba posjeduje klimatski uređaj. Kuća posjeduje garažu u koju je moguće parkirati jedan automobil iza drugog te dva vanjska parkirna mjesta. Vrhunska lokacija okružena zelenilom idealna je oaza za miran obiteljski život. U neposrednoj blizini nalazi se autobusna stanica, trgovine, škola i vrtić. Vlasništvo uredno 1/1. Kuća posjeduje Uporabnu dozvolu, mogućnost kupnje putem kredita. HOUSE, FOR SALE, ZAGREB, BUKOVAC, 224 m², 4-BEDROOM A beautiful four-bedroom house with a spacious yard is for sale. The house is located in Gornji Bukovac. The total area of the house is 224 m² with calculated coefficients, while the living area is 170 m². The house consists of 2 floors: GROUND FLOOR - living room with kitchen and dining area, hallway, garage, WC, utility room, and a terrace with a garden, 1st FLOOR - three bedrooms, a wardrobe, bathroom, and hallway. The house was built in 2004 and completely renovated in 2011, with the facade renewed in 2021. Heating system: individual gas central heating. Underfloor heating is installed everywhere where there is ceramic flooring. Each room has an air conditioning unit. The house has a garage where two cars can be parked one behind the other, as well as two outdoor parking spaces. The prime location surrounded by greenery is an ideal oasis for peaceful family life. In the immediate vicinity, there is a bus stop, shops, a school, and a kindergarten. Ownership is in order 1/1. The house has an occupancy permit, and there is an option for purchasing with a mortgage. ID KOD AGENCIJE: 397 Vlaho Veneti Agent s licencom Mob: 098 166 9011 E-mail: vlaho@kavalir.hr www.kavalir.hr
